bibl.title: Urban Change at Late Roman Trimithis (Dakhleh Oasis, Egypt).
bibl.note: Trimithis: The visible settlement layout. - Trimithis: City status and urban development comparanda. - Methodological and theoretical considerations. - Urban change at Trimithis [Area 4: The temple mound; - Area 2: House B1 and the Bath; - Area 1: House B2 and Courtyard C2]. - Discussion. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Egypt in the First Millennium AD. Perspectives from New Fieldwork

bibl.seg: Anna Lucille Boozer, Urban Change at Late Roman Trimithis (Dakhleh Oasis, Egypt).

Elisabeth R. O'Connell (ed.), Egypt in the First Millennium AD. Perspectives from New Fieldwork = British Museum Publications on Egypt and Sudan. 2 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 23-42, 2 tabl., 7 figg. et pll. 1-3.

Trimithis: The visible settlement layout. - Trimithis: City status and urban development comparanda. - Methodological and theoretical considerations. - Urban change at Trimithis [Area 4: The temple mound; - Area 2: House B1 and the Bath; - Area 1: House B2 and Courtyard C2]. - Discussion. - Conclusion.
